thread.section_title: Someone has been sending used toilet paper to Gary Lineker in the post for 20 years – Metro
thread.title: Someone has been sending used toilet paper to Gary Lineker in the post for 20 years
thread.title_full: Someone has been sending used toilet paper to Gary Lineker in the post for 20 years

author: Coral Barry
title: Someone has been sending used toilet paper to Gary Lineker in the post for 20 years
text:
Gary Lineker has become a presenter since retiring from football (Picture: Getty) For the past 20 years Gary Lineker has been receiving soiled toilet paper in the post and no this is not a joke.
I make them eat their bal**: Ibrahimovic launches attack on critics The former England and Tottenham player has had the nasty packages sent to his home every month as has cricketer, Jonathan Agnew.
Agnew tweeted a message to his tormentor and Lineker was quick to follow up with his own revelation.
Can I ask the charming individual who for 10 years has sent me a soiled piece of toilet paper every Test now address the envelope correctly?
— Jonathan Agnew (@Aggerscricket) December 31, 2016 
@Aggerscricket @brianmoore666 let me guess; sent from a Bath postcode?
— Gary Lineker (@GaryLineker) December 31, 2016 

Agnew and Lineker shared their stories with one another with the cricketer’s ten year exchanges with the soiled toilet paper bandit exclipsed by Lineker’s far longer relationship.
@Aggerscricket @brianmoore666 @piersmorgan goes back almost 20 years for me. Once a month. Disgusting.
— Gary Lineker (@GaryLineker) December 31, 2016 
@piersmorgan @Aggerscricket @brianmoore666 haha. Always thought it was my punishment for Italia 90. Shat on loo roll.
— Gary Lineker (@GaryLineker) December 31, 2016 

Lineker famously admitted to accidentally soiling himself during a World Cup game.
MORE: James Milner form could stop Liverpool from signing a left-back this month, says Anfield favourite
